entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
